lead_paragraph: The department will ask law enforcement agencies and medical examiner’s offices to fill out forms when a person dies in police custody.

headline.print_headline: Justice Department Plans to Streamline How It Tracks Police Killings
headline.main: Justice Department to Streamline Tracking of Police Killings

snippet: The department will ask law enforcement agencies and medical examiner’s offices to fill out forms when a person dies in police custody....
abstract: Justice Dept moves forward with plan to more effectively track killings by police officers across nation, as well as deaths occurring when person was under police custody; proposal comes after several high-profile deaths of blacks at hands of police focused attention on shortcomings of existing Arrest-Related Deaths program, which relies on self-reporting by state and local law enforcement agencies.
